banner_founder.quote: Smartphones have changed a lot of things, but they are just beginning to solve the huge cost challenges of low-tech in food distribution and retail. And there is not only a fix of the «40% food waste» problem, but also shockingly impressive and fast profits for those who offer a solution. Food is the most reliable business there is. Always needed and for everyone.
banner_founder.author: Andrew Yusupov, Founder UNCO

charts_difference.title: Significant price difference even with a retailer 0.5 km from farmer:
charts_difference.button: Buy for farm price using Unco Food Futures

items.text: The farmer is publishing a futures contract for the upcoming sale of milk at a price of 50 cents per liter. The delivery date is in 30 days.
You purchase a “Milk UFF” from us at a price of 50 cents +10% (service commission). In 30 days, you can sell or resell on the “UNCO Exchange” in your country or Worldwide.

Frau Martha counts her money and loves discounts, so she will gladly buy it for 95 cents, especially since it's very fresh — straight from the farm. The milk will be delivered to the pickup point tomorrow.
HoReCa needs fresh products every day, buying small quantities wholesale from distributors at 90 cents. Will they accept the freshest goods from the investor for 85 cents, including delivery?

banner_farmer.orders_per_month_text: regular customer of e-grocery makes 2.4 orders per month*

questions.what_to_do_with_uff: What should I do with “UNCO food futures” after purchase?
questions.pick_up_product: Where can I pick up my product?
questions.seller_guarantee: What guarantee is there that the seller will not deceive me by taking my money but not delivering the goods to me?

answers.what_is_uff: UNCO food futures is a financial contract obligating the buyer to purchase, and the seller to sell, a specific quantity of a food commodity at a predetermined price and date in the future. The tool allows you to save significantly on products. Get «investment» income, what you save is what you earn.
answers.what_to_do_with_uff: You can receive goods using it at a place and time specified in “UFF” or exchange it on the p2p platform.
answers.pick_up_product: Check your UFF for the exact time and address of delivery.
answers.seller_guarantee: If the supplier fails on delivery, UNCO will pay you the original price of the futures contract.
